author: newsr.in
title: Elon Musk’s Tesla Model X launch was a marketing and PR disaster
text: Elon Musk is a genius. He’s a business icon. He’s a massive force for good on our planet, and he’s one of the most impressive people of this century, having founded PayPal, SpaceX, SolarCity, and, of course, Tesla. (Having even one of those on your resume would be amazing.) But what’s not amazing is Elon […] »
